newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Sing Tao chairman not in shr sale talks.
newsitem.headline: Sing Tao chairman not in shr sale talks.

text.p: Newspaper publisher and printer Sing Tao Holdings Ltd said on Thursday its chairman Sally Aw was not involved in talks to sell her stake in the company.

"Miss Aw has informed the company that she is not currently involved in any negotiations, nor has she executed any agreement, concerning the sale of her shares in the company," Sing Tao said in a statement.
Newspapers reported this week that Aw was negotiating the sale of all or part of her 68 percent holding in Sing Tao.
Trading in Sing Tao shares was suspended on Wednesday and was due to resume on Thursday. The stock last traded at HK$3.80.
